definition: the military installation from which a commander performs the functions of command
details:
noun
- the military installation from which a commander performs the functions of command
= example: the military installation from which a commander performs the functions of command
= synonyms: military headquarters
- (usually plural) the office that serves as the administrative center of an enterprise
= example: (usually plural) the office that serves as the administrative center of an enterprise
= synonyms: central office, main office, home office, home base
- (plural) a military unit consisting of a commander and the headquarters staff
